uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

port_not_equal.description: Applies to all ports but the one specified on this field. port_not_equal should be non-zero when port_range_start and port_range_end are zero.

port_range_start.description: Applies to all ports starting at the one specified on this field. If it applies to a single port, then start and end values should be equal. port_range_start should be non zero, when port_not_equal is zero.

port_range_end.description: Applies to all ports ending at the one specified on this field. If it applies to a single port, then start and end values should be equal. port_range_end should be non zero, when port_not_equal is zero.
